id.description: The legal entity ID of the user that has a contractual relationship with your platform.

pciTemplateReferences.description: The array of Adyen-generated unique identifiers for the questionnaires.

signedBy.description: The [legal entity ID](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/legalentity/latest/post/legalEntities__resParam_id) of the individual who signs the PCI questionnaire.

$ul: **pciQuestionnaireIds**: The unique identifiers of the signed PCI documents.
